alert.note: Alert for Massac; Pope (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 8:50PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Massac, southern Pope, western Livingston, northwestern Marshall, eastern Carlisle, northeastern Hickman, southeastern Ballard, McCracken and northern Graves Counties through 930 PM CST... At 849 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Metropolis to 7 miles southeast of Bardwell. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Water could pond on area roads adn highways Strong thunderstorms will be near... Metropolis around 855 PM CST. Paducah by 905 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Paducah, Reidland, Ledbetter and Calvert City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 25. Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 28 and 38. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 44 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
